reviews.title: Best virtual guitar !!!!
reviews.comment: Multitouch is good. Sound is good. Option is good. Everything is good
reviews.author: Tyonanda Gaotama

reviews.title: Awesome cool
reviews.comment: Excelent app download it and enjoy the guitar
reviews.author: Jagdish Sidhu

reviews.title: Upgrade
reviews.comment: After the upgrade this is perhapsly the best guitar app on the store. There are so many options and still runs smooth as butter on my mediapad 7. P.S: I was just about to uninstall it because there is no chord mode!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Electric guitar not for rock n roll
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app to rock n roll but the any of the guitars are not for rock n roll. If you will rock n roll dont download this app.
reviews.author: David Anthony Fadri

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: APP IS AWESOME. I REQUEST U TO MAKE ONE SOUND LIKE ,LIKE IN TRANSFORMER THEME THE GUITAR SOUND LIKE U R STARTING AN ENGINE..PLZ MAKE ONE LIKE THAT.
reviews.author: Prince Aladdin

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great but in chord mode the \"chunky string\" doesn\'t twang when i strum it on some of the frets if this even makes any sense. Sounds awesome though but with the chunky string working it will sound more awesome :)
reviews.author: Jason Cassidy

reviews.title: music 101
reviews.comment: excellent! i am in terms a wannabe musician, a beginner at guitar, while the other apps at the store didn\'t get to me, playing on \"My Guitar\" is so easy that i feel like a rockstar!!! A must have for musicians and even beginners.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: I love this app.its awesome i have already made a song from it.
reviews.author: Eddie Lukac

reviews.title: WOW!!!
reviews.comment: I am so impressed with this app! There are so many options, settings, and extras I can\'t believe its free. I wouldnt be suprized if someone recorded an entire album with this. I have no idea how to play guitar and no matter what I play it sounds great. I also downloaded My Drums and My Piano and they are just as great. This developer is awesome!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pure stringed junk
reviews.comment: This app is a pile of... it sounds like a broken church organ. You can\'t tune it our hold the chords. Die app die
reviews.author: John Meisenheimer

reviews.title: Galnex user
reviews.comment: Good application! Simply to teach my daughter playing guitar
reviews.author: Philip Daniel

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I love this app it\'s really cool but the only thing I don\'t know how to do is change the guitar if anyone to tell me that that would be perfect
reviews.author: MadI DeSantis

reviews.title: Its great, Tho!
reviews.comment: Well im indonesian girl. 11 YO, 6th grade Elementary S. Since July i learn how to play guitar by myself, w/out teacher. I remembered all the chord and i played \"One Thing\" from One Direction Accoustic version with my guitar once. Its little bit difficult but i love this app! Its amazing! Its like a real guitar! Unbelieveable i really like it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eric
reviews.comment: Love the nice clean loud sound... Cool
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Guitar out of tune
reviews.comment: I thought I was going mad. The 1st and 2nd frets on the A string play the same sample. Sounds aweful, but fun. If they fix this, it\'s the best guitar app on Android.
reviews.author: Donovan Hutcheon

reviews.title: Need help
reviews.comment: I m using hTC desire V n i dont hav an in-built menu button in my phone n i couldn\'t find menu button in dis app. How can i go to next window for more features n settings? Plz help me out...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost excellent
reviews.comment: I have purchased and used the best guitar apps on android.but this app is just flawless and its free.while playing fast tune it doesn\'t lag like solo and jimi guitar and most others. The only thing i found as a downside was that there is only 6 frets total.please add more and i would give a top 5.thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great guitar simulator Already made up a song with it!
reviews.author: anthony romano

reviews.title: BEST OUT THERE!
reviews.comment: This is THE BEST guitar app there! Very fun to practice & play around with! Highly recommend!!!(^-^)
reviews.author: Rachael Hicks

reviews.comment: Awesome.I tried it at night and I used the low sound and it sounded kind of creepy like as if I was in a horror movie.coool.can someone tell me where the setting are?\tLove it.
reviews.author: A Google User
